ar.com.hjg.pngj.samples
Class PngCreate

java.lang.Object
  ar.com.hjg.pngj.samples.PngCreate

public class PngCreate
extends java.lang.Object

Creates a test image (size , bit depth and alpha as arguments) Can choose between simple gray image or test image with colour gradations As an example and test.
